title: ESBI  Education Accreditation Records
description: ESBI Accreditation record schema for educational contexts

@context.description: Defines semantic context of the Education Accreditation Records

id.description: Defines a unique identifier of the Verifiable attestation

authorizationClaims.description: Defines a list of claims that define/determine the authorization of an Issuer to issue certain types of VCs. Mandatory

accreditationType.description: Defines the type of accreditation. Mandatory*

decision.description: Defines the Quality Decision issued by the Quality Assuring Authority

report.description: Includes a publicly accessible report of the quality assurance decision

limitQualification.description: Defines The qualification that was accredited

id.description: Defines a portable and unique identifier of the qualification

title.description: Defines the title of the qualification

alternativeLabel.description: Defines an alternative name of the qualification

EQFLevel.description: Defines the qualification level as specified by the European Qualification Framework.

NQFLevel.description: Defines the qualification level as specified by a National Qualification Framework.

limitField.description: Defines The field of education for which the accreditation is valid

limitQFLevel.description: Defines the european qualification level for which the accreditation is valid

limitJurisdiction.description: Defines the jurisdiction for which the accreditation is valid

reviewDate.description: Defines the The date when the accreditation has to be re-viewed
